info.name: Card Constructor
info.attribution:
Layout and scripting by Mitchell Stolycia.

The “join” icon used for the combiner button is from game-icons.net, created by Delapouite, and available for use as described in the About section.

Card faces, card backs, and the public library image were created by Mitchell Stolycia, released to the public domain under CC0.
info.description: Construct and modify your own cards in a simple ladder climbing game.
info.helpText:
Heroic vs Ruinous
The Heroic version is similar to Custom Heroes.
The Ruinous version is similar to Ruins.

Combining cards
  1. Add cards to the combiner.
  2. Click the combiner button.
Multiple cards can only be combined if their values are in different regions of the card.
When combining cards, the total values will be added to the primary card value. The coloured boxes with values can be ignored from then on, but not overwritten.
Heroic example: you can combine two advancements if they contain a +6 on the bottom left of the card and a -1 on the bottom right of the card. However, advancements containing +6 and -1 both on the bottom left of their cards cannot be combined.

Ruinous example: you can combine two upgrades if they contain a +6 in the pink top square and ££ in the yellow bottom square of same card. However, upgrades containing +6 and ££ both in the same square cannot be combined.
Playing cards
Play cards to one of the play areas. On the next player's turn, they should play cards to the empty play area, then click End turn.

Player turns will get skipped automatically if they are out of the round (have zero cards in hand).

Ruinous specific
Purchasing upgrades
Simply take the upgrade(s) you would like and combine them onto a card you are playing.
Click on your £ coins next to your seat to spend them.
The market will refresh when you press End turn.
Flipping a card to its black upgrades and/or claiming a card
Click on the card.
